hero.heading: Case Studies
hero.description: Real problems. Real solutions. Measurable outcomes.

studies.title: Enterprise Cloud Migration
studies.challenge: A major financial services firm was running legacy on-premise infrastructure that was costly, fragile, and unable to scale for peak trading volumes.
studies.solution: We architected a multi-region AWS migration strategy with zero-downtime cutover, containerized microservices, and automated disaster recovery.
outcomes: SOC 2 and PCI DSS compliance maintained

studies.title: AI-Powered Predictive Maintenance
studies.challenge: Unplanned equipment downtime was costing a global manufacturer millions annually. Existing maintenance was reactive, not predictive.
studies.solution: We built ML models trained on IoT sensor data to predict equipment failures 48 hours in advance, with automated alerting and maintenance scheduling.

studies.title: ServiceNow ITSM Transformation
studies.challenge: A healthcare network with 15,000+ employees had fragmented IT service management — slow ticket resolution, no SLA tracking, and siloed teams.
studies.solution: Full ServiceNow ITSM implementation with custom workflows, automated routing, self-service portal, and CMDB integration.
outcomes: 50% reduction in ticket volume via self-service

studies.title: SAP BTP Integration Suite
studies.challenge: A global retailer had disconnected SAP systems across 12 countries — manual data entry, inventory mismatches, and delayed order fulfillment.
studies.solution: Unified SAP BTP integration connecting ERP, CRM, and supply chain systems with real-time data sync and Fiori-based dashboards.

studies.title: Digital Experience Platform
studies.challenge: An energy company had an outdated, monolithic website that couldn't support personalization, was slow to update, and had poor mobile experience.
studies.solution: Headless CMS architecture with Optimizely, Next.js frontend, personalized content delivery, and progressive web app capabilities.
